subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Omar Infante, a 31-year-old free agent, agreed to a four-year deal with the Kansas City Royals, according to a person familiar with the deal, which is pending a physical.
snippet: Omar Infante, a 31-year-old free agent, agreed to a four-year deal with the Kansas City Royals, according to a person familiar with the deal, which is pending a physical.
